articles.author: Rich Edson, Alex Pappas
articles.title: Cruz pushes Senate resolution praising Soleimani mission, daring Dems to oppose
articles.description: Texas Sen. Ted Cruz, a noted Iran hawk, is circulating a resolution in the Senate that would commend the Trump administration for killing Iranian General Qassem Soleimani, aides told Fox News on Friday.
articles.content:
Texas Sen. Ted Cruz, a noted Iran hawk, is circulating a resolution in the Senate that would commend the Trump administration for killing Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani, aides told Fox News on Friday.

articles.title: Marie Harf: Soleimani killing is most 'consequential decision' by US in Middle East since Iraq War

articles.author: Joseph Wulfsohn
articles.title: Top Dems slammed for their 'yeah, but' reactions to Solemani airstrike
articles.description: Prominent Democrats are being criticized for what has been perceived as a pattern of "yeah, but" reactions to the U.S. airstrike that led to the killing of Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani that include condemnation of President Trump's order of the takedown.

articles.title: Notable Quotables for Friday, January 3
articles.description: Highlights from another busy week in Washington and around the world.

articles.author: Melissa Leon
articles.title: Airstrike kills 5 members of Iran-backed militia, Iraq official says
articles.description: An airstrike Friday hit two cars carrying members of an Iran-backed militia north of Iraq's capital, Baghdad, killing five members, an Iraqi official told The Associated Press.
articles.content:
An airstrike Friday hit two cars carrying members of an Iran-backed militia north of Iraq's capital, Baghdad, killing five members, an Iraqi official told The Associated Press.
The official added that the identities of those killed were not immediately known… [+873 chars]

articles.author: Gregg Jarrett
articles.title: Gregg Jarrett: In ordering Soleimani killing, Trump acting correctly, decisively and constitutionally
articles.description: President Trump did not need congressional permission to order an attack that killed Iranian terrorist Qassem Soleimani.
articles.content:
President Trump ordered an airstrike that killed the notorious Iranian terrorist, Qassem Soleimani, who murdered hundreds of Americans. The President was constitutionally empowered to do so.
Democrats, of course, reflexively whined that Trump abused his powe… [+5269 chars]

articles.title: FLASHBACK: Charles Krauthammer compares Iran policies of Trump, 'supine' Obama

articles.title: Bloomberg blasts Sanders' 'outrageous' claim that Soleimani strike was an 'assassination'
articles.description: Mayor Michael Bloomberg balked at fellow 2020 candidate and Sen. Bernie Sanders' suggestion that President Trump carried out an "assassination" when he ordered a lethal strike on Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani.
